# Delete an App Screenshot Set

**Web Service Endpoint**

Delete an app screenshot set and all of its screenshots.

## Creating and Deleting Screenshot Sets

- **Create an App Screenshot Set**: Add a new screenshot set to an App Store version localization for a specific screenshot type and display size.

items.description: Add a new screenshot set to an App Store version localization for a specific screenshot type and display size.
